definition: to repeat (one's own words or sb else's)/(in the classroom) to paraphrase what one has learned
variant of 複述|复述[fu4 shu4]
to go and return/to return/to resume/to return to a normal or original state/to repeat/again/to recover/to restore/to turn over/to reply/to answer/to reply to a letter/to retaliate/to carry out
to repeat/to double/to overlap/complex (not simple)/compound/composite/double/diplo-/duplicate/overlapping/to duplicate
variant of 復|复[fu4]/to reply to a letter
to state/to tell/to narrate/to relate

sentences.english: Rita repeated what Reardon recited when Reardon road the remarks.
sentences.chinese: 当利尔登阅读评论时，丽塔复述尔登背诵的东西。

sentences.english: And, again, the husband should listen and repeat her points.
sentences.chinese: 而丈夫还是倾听并复述妻子说话的内容。

sentences.english: The little girlstudent was reproducing the story in Lesson Three.
sentences.chinese: 这个小女学生正在复述第三课中的故事。

sentences.english: Listen carefully to every word you hear, then repeat them out loud.
sentences.chinese: 仔细地听清楚每一个单词，然后响亮地复述出来。

sentences.english: Try repeating people who have British accents.
sentences.chinese: 试着复述有英国口音的人说的话。

sentences.english: Students look and talk about the pictures in pairs.
sentences.chinese: 学生看图并复述，拼读单词。

sentences.english: Listen to the passage and repeat it. Try to be the TV presenter.
sentences.chinese: 小组练习，根据每句提示词试复述文章。

sentences.english: After a few repetitions, the child soon became word perfect .
sentences.chinese: 重复几次后，小孩很快就能一字不差地复述了。

sentences.english: What has been your charge for repeating this very plausible story?
sentences.chinese: 你复述这个娓娓动听的故事，得到了多少酬劳？

sentences.english: Please retell the fairy story in English.
sentences.chinese: 请用英语复述这篇童话故事。

sentences.english: It's a long excerpt from the Bible.
sentences.chinese: 一场戏中需要他复述《圣经》中很长的一段。

sentences.english: Some people restate the job's requirements in their summary of qualifications or objective.
sentences.chinese: 很多人在简历中或目标总结中复述工作要求。

sentences.english: The study of paraphrase is about the synonymy phenomena of phrases or sentences.
sentences.chinese: 复述研究的对象主要是短语或者句子的同义现象。

sentences.english: Test suspected liars by making them read alternate versions of their stories.
sentences.chinese: 测试疑似说谎者时，可令他们以不同版本复述谎话。

sentences.english: That is, with the retelling of a relevantand useful personal story.
sentences.chinese: 也就是，复述与之相关的实用的个人故事。

definition: to pass on (stories)/to relate
to repeat/to restate/to recapitulate
to relate (a story or information)/to tell or talk about/to recount/narration/telling/narrative/account
word for word/verbatim
see 一字不漏[yi1 zi4 bu4 lou4]
without missing a word
an assertion/to declare/to state
from beginning to end/in its entirety/in accord with fact/literal
to understand (on hearing)/to catch (what is spoken)
to recount/to narrate/to give an account of
one time (all the way through)/once through
vivid and colorful (idiom); true to life/lively and realistic
brief and to the point (idiom)/succinct
to make a deeper impression on sb
lit. count by fives and tens (idiom); to narrate systematically and in full detail
literal/word by word and phrase by phrase
